item.title: Creat multi Jenkins containers in Linux based on systemd-nspawn
item.description:
0x00 Introduction

This tutorial will describe how to create multiple isolated containers in Linux and run multiple Jenkins in them using Systemd-nspawn container technology.

item.title: WHOIAM
item.description: I am studying for Master degree of Distributed Systems in KTH Royal Institute of Technology. I am a enthusiasts of Arch Linux, I had used Arch Linux as my main system for 3 years, then I switch back to the Microsoft Windows after Microsoft began to do some right things. Now I work on Arch Linux as WSL and a plan-b system. I was a crazy fun of Touhou Project. My favorite animation is CLANNAD and EVA.
